comment: Very vanillary on the nose. Slight hint of lemon-orange at the end. On the palate a subdued honey mellowness progressing to a spiced lavender finish. Pass.

Citrus notes, reminds me of yuzu 
Palate smoky
Love the Hellyers style, fresh cereal notes, very lively and a subtle flavor that is distintively Hellyers - 12YO is the pinnacle and a great highland style dram ! Love it
